name: Kit
description: Stuck giving autographs to his rabid fans at Starr Toon Studios, cartoony superstar Kit often daydreams of becoming relevant in the industry again, respected for his acting chops rather than his looks.

gadgets.name: Cardboard Box
gadgets.description: Hide in a cardboard box becoming invisible for 5 seconds. Charges the Super 100% faster while stationary.

gadgets.name: Cheeseburger
gadgets.description: Heals himself and the friendly Brawler he is attached to for 40%.

starpowers.name: Power Hungry
starpowers.description: Kit gains 200% power from each Power Cube.

starpowers.name: Overly Attached
starpowers.description: Kit attaches to friendly Brawlers for 5 seconds longer.

tips: Kit's Super is best used in team game modes, where he can attach to an ally and deal massive damage with his attack, while also healing himself.
Do not jump on an enemy if they have their teammates near them. Instead, use the Super on isolated enemies to allow your teammates to finish them off, or onto low health enemies to defeat them.

Kit is a decent choice in Showdown as he can chain Supers indefinitely once he has obtained a moderate number of Power Cubes. This process is easier and quicker with his Power Hungry Star Power, and once he has acquired around six Power Cubes, he will dominate the match. He works better in Duo Showdown as he can heal his teammates, control and damage his enemies while being invulnerable, and acquire double Power Cube buffs. His Cardboard Box Gadget is also useful, as it allows him to speed up his Super charge rate, sneak up on enemies, or flee from enemies.

super.name: Carry Me
super.description: Jump and attach to the back of another Brawler. Heals allies and damages enemies over time.
